General.Name: Hancom Lifecare Inc.
General.Description: HANCOM LIFECARE Inc. manufactures and sells personal safety equipment in South Korea, Vietnam, Mongolia, Indonesia, Thailand, the Philippines, and the Middle East countries. The company offers air respirators and marine air respirators; firefighting suits, helmets, boots, and gloves; and masks. Its products used in military, fire, and industrial markets, as well as the smart city public safety field. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Yongin-si, South Korea.
